Title: Fun and Fancy Free
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical, Romance
Writer: Homer Brightman (story), Harry Reeves (story), Ted Sears (story), Lance Nolley (story), Eldon Dedini (story), Tom Oreb (story), Sinclair Lewis (from an original story by)
Actors: Edgar Bergen, Dinah Shore, Luana Patten, Anita Gordon
Plot: Jiminy Cricket hosts two Disney animated shorts: "Bongo," about a circus bear escaping to the wild, and "Mickey and the Beanstalk," a take on the famous fairy tale.
